div.p: This CodeSystem provides coded concepts to represent the coarse categories of reimbursement that may affect a laboratory service

tr.td: no reimbursement provided for the service in general
normal reimbursement dispositions applicable to the service
reimbursement of service subject to conditions
normal reimbursement limited to a part of the service
reimbursement limited to a part of the service and subject to conditions

title.value: Kinds of reibursability coarse categories for a laboratory service

description.value: This CodeSystem resource provides the concepts representing coarse categories of reimbursement dispositions for laboratory services

display.value: no reimbursement provided for the service in general
normal reimbursement dispositions applicable to the service
reimbursement of service subject to conditions
normal reimbursement limited to a part of the service
reimbursement limited to a part of the service and subject to conditions
